channel.title: Need help with client
channel.description: I made some custom models, and I was curious if anyone could help me make the codes as to where like... tabarea 1 is the cache i use in game, I'm not a java scripter i'm just doing for my friend while hes asleep. I'm his forum dev and gfx, but I know very little about javascripting... please help?, also, how to upload custom image?

item.title: Need help with client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

TSK_Ben:

I made some custom models, and I was curious if anyone could help me make the codes as to where like… tabarea 1 is the cache i use in game, I’m not a java scripter i’m just doing for my friend while hes asleep. I’m his forum dev and gfx, but I know very little about javascripting… please help?, also, how to upload custom image?

Unless your client supports scripting, I’m not sure how far you’re going to get with Javascript.

Read full topic
